## IDK - 100 pts
*Cryptography*

#### Description: 
idk, you should know

`Author: Idzoyy`

chall.py:
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from sympy import nextprime
from Crypto.Util.Padding import pad

n = 8
flag = pad(b'ajkjdnkajndkjansdaihanjbjabsjdbasdhajbdjasbdjhasbjdabsjdhabsjdbajsdbjasbdjasbdjasbdjabdjadb',n)

assert len(flag)%n == 0

n = len(flag)//n
flag = [flag[i:i+n] for i in range(0,len(flag),n)]
c = sum([nextprime(bytes_to_long(flag[i]))*2**(0x1337-158*(2*i+1)) for i in range(len(flag))])

print(c)
```

out.txt:
```

```

#### Flag: `ARA6{saya_terus_terang_ga_tahu_ini_tiba_tiba_terus_terang_saya_tidak_diberi_tahu_saya_tidak_tahu_dan_saya_bahkan_bertanya_tanya_kenapa_kok_saya_tidak_diberi_tahu_sampai_hari_ini_saya_ga_tahu}`

##### Note: I had to brute force a little bit because the script [solve.py](https://github.com/hush1a/CTF-archive/blob/main/ARA6.0/Cryptography%20-%20IDK/solve.py) produced an almost complete flag, and i had to guess a few letters.
